name: Star am Dom

reviews.text: Stayed here for 3 nights in May 2007 as part of a pre-wedding (stag) party. Didn't expect great things for what we paid for the rooms but all 13 of us were pleasantly surprised by our stay - less than £90 (US$180 / €135 ) for three nights bed & breakfast. As has been recorded by another tripadvisor reviewer, this hotel used to be called the Amsterdam.
reviews.title: Basic but comfortable. Great for large groups...

likes.disliked: — The rooms were really too warm for comfort

reviews.text: Rooms were comfortable and clean, if a little basic. En-suite bathroom facilities were fine. The only minor criticisms were that the rooms were uncomfortably warm and the rooms at the front of the hotel suffer from traffic noise unless the windows are kept closed. Having said that, the rooms at the rear of the hotel can be overwhelmed by church bells on a Sunday morning!!
reviews.title: It's OK

reviews.text: The hotel is quite well placed for visiting the centre of Cologne and is a 5-10 minute walk from the railway station and Cologne Cathedral. There is no parking (other than streets or car parks) but the public transport system from Cologne airport to the city centre is very good. I'm certain the train fare is about €3. Taxi fare is almost €30.
reviews.title: Not too bad, a bit of a walk to the catherdral

description: Im Herzen von Köln finden Sie unser exklusives 3 Sterne Hotel Superior Star am Dom, das nur wenige Schritte vom Hauptbahnhof entfernt ist. Entdecken Sie die beachtliche Vielfalt unserer Zimmer.Das Star am Dom gehört zu den modernsten Kölner Hotels seiner Kategorie. Es verfügt über 40 geräumige Zimmer mit Domblick in über 20 Zimmern.Mit seinem eleganten Interieur (Designer Möbel kombiniert mit warmen Farben und internationalem Style) und der modernen komfortablen Ausstattung (Bäder mit Fußbodenheizung / 32 Zoll LCD / safe).
